string-array.name: quotes_block
string-array.item: "We are out of quotes at the moment."
"You already reached your quota. Give up!"
"This is getting annoying, we will NOT give you another quote."
"Don't you have to work or something?"
"No job uh? I'll give a work to you, touch this button 10 more times."
"Seriously, we don't have many quotes here so we need to be creative."
"Here, I'll give this one just for you: \n \"I like to insist on trivial things and have nothing better to do. \n - You"
"OK, I will have to resort to drastic measures now.\n Self destruction in 5 touches…"
